column5: Hey everyone,  Back to the board for another ice fishing season.  Was wondering what the ice conditions at Virginia Beach are.  Got out between Christmas and New Year's last year.  Wondering if I'll be able to the same this time.  Cheers all.  Tony.
Next week should be ready for foot-travel only.
lots of people walking out hear some skidoos and atvs running around 1 hut op has 2 huts out  now if this high wind doesn't    blow it all away

Thanks Terry and Danbo!  I think A Christmas day or Boxing day drive up there may be in order.  Anyone else interested?  Today I think is a good time to dig out the ice rods and change the lines.  Cheers all.  Tony
The word is that Dave's has huts on the ice.
Hey newf how she be goin? With the high winds and the plus digits coming,that would make me go hmmmmmmm.
Lard geezus Brian,  Long time.  Yeah now I'm wondering what its like up there in V.B now.  Anyone know if the ice is still safe or now a big mess?  Thanks,  Tony.
